Message:
I used to have two older sisters—
Urd and Belldandy.

Urd was clever, and Belldandy
was fashionable...
I looked up to them.

One day, my family brought
me along to a remote village.
There, I met three wonderful girls.

My heart skipped a beat
when I heard that I’d be staying
for a few years to study medicine.

It was the same excitement
I felt whenever I discovered
new herbs.

I had found new friends...
no, new sisters.

I’m younger than Urd and
Belldandy, but I’m older
than these girls.

In other words,
I’m their big sister.
